channel.title: Calangute on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu
channel.description: Recent content in Calangute on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu

item.title: Viva GOA - Preamble
item.description: Trip to Goa was long due may-be you can say from 2001 when I got opportunity as a teacher with my school children. But unfortunately, I couldn’t make as I was supposed to behave as good girl. Good unmarried Indian girls don’t go anywhere without an escort. To qualify as an escort there are lots of criteria to be checked and considered like friend’s brother, acquaintance from neighborhood etc. is a BIG NO.
